description:
> `Description`: `invite study owner` Creates a new [Account] for the specified [emailAddress] with the `CARP Admin` role. A corresponding invitational e-mail will be sent out to the invited [emailAddress].

* permission for this invitation has only system administrators.

> `Request`: (Http Method: [POST]) https://cans.cachet.dk:443/api/accounts/carp-admin

This request must be authenticated using a HTTP OAuth 2.0 Authentication header.

> `Response`:

- This request doesn't return a response body. 
- On failure status code `400` (bad request) is returned.
- On failure status code `401` (unauthorized) is returned.
- On failure status code `500` (internal server error) is returned.
